sentences.en: A saguaro cactus stands tall amid a frenzy of lightning bolts in Arizona.
sentences.cn: 亚利桑那州，一株巨人柱仙人掌矗立在一团狂暴的闪电中。

sentences.en: The species responsible for this image a local monarch of the saguaro [ pictured ] of southern Arizona.
sentences.cn: 正是仙人掌界的主宰树形仙人掌,造成了人们的这种印象.图为南亚利桑那州的 树形 仙人掌.

sentences.en: They include the endangered Mexican Wolf and giant Saguaro cactus.
sentences.cn: 包括了濒危的墨西哥狼和巨大的萨挂诺仙人掌.

trans.tran_en: a giant cactus, Carnegiea gigantea, of desert regions of Arizona, S California, and Mexico, having white nocturnal flowers and edible red pulpy fruits
